Is that intentional?
The answer, from a scan of Bart DavenportÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s discography, is an overwhelming Ã¢â‚¬Å“yes.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ His catalog is a series of nested quotations brilliantly lifted and folded into power-pop confections that he's mastered, down to the lemon zest and sea-salt sprinkles on top. Ã¢â‚¬Å“Keep it light and keep it loose,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ he sings, and it's one of the albumÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s few telling lyrics.
